  Source   Edit

DO NOT INCLUDE THIS MODULE!

This module is intended to only be used internally by trackerboy modules.

take me back home â†©

Types

  volumeStepLeft*, volumeStepRight*: float32
  samplerate: int
  factor: float32
  highpass: float32
  buffer: seq[Pcm]
  sampleOffset: float32
  accums: array[2, Accumulator]
